text: Dari depan sekilas Hotelnya nampak kecil. Tapi begitu sampai dalam hotel, kita di bikin kaget dengan kebersihan, kerapian tata letak ruangan dan CS+staff yang ramah dan hangat. Dan pagi hari nya kita semua lagi-lagi di puaskan dengan rasa sarapan yg menurut saya seperti restoran yg cita rasanya nikmat. Beda dengan hotel terkenal yang kadang rasa sarapannya terkesan "tawar". Dan akhir kata Saya beserta team mengucapakan terima kasih sekali kepada Mbak Titis dan Team hotelSriti utk semua support, peehatian dan servicenya. Sukses utk penjenengan semuanya. Amin

text:
Sungguh Memuaskan menginap disini.. 
1. Harga ga bikin kantong bolong : 
- room rate : untuk fasilitas yang oke sungguh unexpected padahal high season lebaran ya
- laundry : saya laundry baju renang anak hanya 3000/baju dan daleman anak 1500/pcs, sungguh kaget masih ada harga segitu di 2019 ini
- food : saya pesan makanan untuk anak saya setelah berenang sore. nasi + nugget hanya 20rb, kentang 18rb. rasanya untuk harga makanan hotel disini murah nya kebangetan

2. Design lanskap bagus (nanti saya share fotonya) kamar juga bersih dan nyaman

3. Makanannya enak!

4. Staff Ramah dan helpful, saya narik2 koper dari parkiran langsung gerak cepat dibawakan ke kamar

5. Dekat dengan pusat kota (bahkan bisa jalan kaki ke pertokoan)

6. Pool Kids Friendly for toddler, tanpa orang tua nyemplung pun inshaAllah aman

minus nya disini cuma 1 : Ga ada lift alias hanya tangga, jd yang bawa orangtua wajib pesan kamar lantai dasar yaa..

Selamat mencoba!

text:
Awalnya tidak ada rencana untuk menginap, tetapi setelah melihat hotel sriti di internet, kami tertarik untuk menginap. Lokasi agak tersembunyi bagi mereka yang pertama kali datang ke Magelang, akan tetapi sebenarnya lokasinya sangat strategis dan terletak di tengah kota.

Hotel model klasik jawa, banyak objek foto yang fotogenic. Kolam renang yang menyenangkan, ada kolam pendek khusus anak + air mancur. Terdapat gazebo di samping kolam renang untuk bersantai sambil melihat kolam renang. Kamar kecil tetapi nyaman, kebetulan saya mendapat kamar di lantai 1 dengan view ke kolam renang. 

Pegawai sangat ramah dan cepat merespon. Proses check in cepat. Sarapan cukup lengkap untuk ukuran hotel kecil. Pegawai restoran sangat tanggap terhadap tamu yang datang untuk sarapan. Terdapat pula banyak tempat foto yang instagrammable. Terdapat area kecil untuk bermain bagi anak-anak, dengan berbagai permainan seperti kartu uno, congklak, dan berbagai buku. Harga sangat bersahabat untuk hotel yang sangat homey seperti hotel sriti ini.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Kami sudah ke hotel ini berkali kali, setiap tahun kualitasnya semakin baik, diantaranya:
1. Kamarnya sangat nyaman, lengkap dengan kulkas kecil, save deposit box yang cukup untuk laptop, air minum, sabun mandi dan shampoo dengan wadah yang ramah lingkungan, hair dryer, sabun cuci tangan, tissue, handuk, sandal hotel, kaca yang besar dan tempat koper yang luas. Stop kontak ada di dekat TV dan di kanan kiri tempat tidur. 
2. Dekorasi antar ruang juga sangat menarik dilengkapi oleh buatan galeri hotel.
3. Ada kedai kecil dekat kolam renang.
4. Kolam renang bisa untuk dewasa dan ada yang khusus anak anak.
5. Area parkir cukup untuk beberapa mobil yang menginap.
6. Ruang makan di lantai 2, cocok untuk yang masih kuat naik tangga ke atas. Ruang makan sangat seperti di rumah, menggunakan natural lighting, dekorasi detail yang rapi dan hangat.
6. Ragam makanan cukup untuk menu sarapan dilengkapi dengan minuman tradisional, buah dan sayur.
7. Proses Check in dan Check out cepat.
8. Karyawan ramah dan sangat membantu bila kami membutuhkan bantuan.
9. Lokasi di tengah kota dekat dengan alun-alun kota Magelang, lokasi wisata kota, pusat kuliner,  toko oleh-oleh dan pusat perbelanjaan.
10.Meski berada di pusat kota, ketika berada di hotel yang bernuansa rumah ini, rasanya tenang dan damai. Sangat cocok sebagai tempat beristirahat.

Kami merekomendasikan pada siapa saja yang ingin bermalam di Magelang untuk menginap di hotel ini 😊.

title: Hotel terbaik di Magelang

text:
kami sampai sekitar pukul 21.00 malam, pertama kami check in dengan lancar, karena kami booking dengan Ago** 1 kamar dengan memanfaatkan point dan 1 kamar lainnya booking langsung dengan bagian reservasi, bagian reservasi sangat ramah dan menyenangkan menerima kami, permasalahan timbul pada kebijakan hotel yang menginginkan dibayar lunasnya 1 kamar hotel kami yang di pesan pada bagian reservasi hotel, sedangkan kami menginginkan kamar hotel dibayar setelah kami menginap besok hari, dengan jaminan kartu identitas kami, bahkan kami menawarkan open kartu kredit. Tetapi kebijakan hotel tdk menghendaki demikian kami tetap di minta untk membayar atau kunci kamar tidak diberikan. Bahkan untk berbicara dengan supervisor pun tidak diperkenankan walaupun melalui telpon.  Hal ini sangat membuat kami tidak nyaman, karena tidak adanya solusi terhadap hal tersebut. hilanglah semua kesan awal yang sangat baik tadi. kemudian kami mengambil solusi dengan membooking kembali dengan account ago** kami dan selesai masalah pembayaran tadi. 

Dengan koordinasi sebelumnya bahwa kami akan datang dengan malam hari dgn kamar dengan persyaratan tempat tidur double bed, dan kamar berada di depan kolam renang dan bath tub. sewaktu kami masuk kamar yang berlokasi didepan kolam renang, ternyata tidak tersedia Bath tub yang dijanjikan, malam itu pun kami dicarikan kamar sesuai dengan yang dijanjikan, kamar kedua akhirnya sesuai dengan permintaan walaupun dengan lokasi tidak didepan kolam renang. Permasalahan timbul lagi, dengan tidak berfungsinya pendingin ruangan dengan baik, karena tidak adanya kamar sesuai dengan yang dijanjikan, maka diupgrade kamar kami ke family room, kamar paling baik sesuai dengan yang dijanjikan. 

Fasilitas kamar sangat baik, bahkan kami beranggapan bahwa hotel ini lebih baik mempunyai bintang empat karena dengan fasilitas kolam renang yang baik yang disenangi oleh anak anak kami,  amenities kamar yang baik. Sarapan juga sangat baik, dengan pelayanan yang baik.

Sewaktu checkout kami pun akhirnya berkoordinasi dengan supervisor, dan menceritakan mengenai kesulitan sewaktu checkin karena kebijakan hotel. dan ditanggapi dengan baik oleh supervisor.
title: Hotel yang baik dan bagus dengan pelayanan yang baik dan kebijakan pembayaran hotel yang kaku.

text:
Kami menginap 2 malam di hotel Sriti, Magelang. Suasananya nyaman. Pelayanannya sangat memuaskan. Proses check in dan check out cepat. JIka anda menginap bersama 1 anak, dan ingin tidur dengan tempat tidur luas, kami rekomendasikan kamar Family ( kamar nomor 30 ). Walaupun kamar ini menghadap ke kolam renang, namun suara di luar tidak mengganggu kami.
Kami menikmati sarapan kami. Ada staff yang melayani kami dengan ramah, untuk diambilkan soto, omelet , juga kopi. Walaupun tidak terlalu banyak variasi, namun rasa masakannya bagi kami cukup lezat . Hotel juga bersih, amenities cukup lengkap.  Lokasi hotel juga cukup strategis. Dekat dengan alun alun, wisata kuliner dan tempat wisata lainnya. Hanya dibutuhkan kurang dari 1 jam untuk mencapai Borobudur, juga ke Ketep Pass. Benar benar value for money.
title: value for money
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Hotel Sriti ada di pusat kota.  Ke "Pecinan" (Jalan Pemuda, tempat puluhan toko dan pusat perbelanjaan serta oleh-oleh khas Magelang) hanya lima menit jalan kaki.  Namun demikian, hotel ini sangat tenang dan nyaman.  Begitu kita datang biasanya disambut dengan tawaran "Wedang Secang", minuman khas Magelang yang membuat tubuh jadi hangat dan "hidup kembali".  Kalau malam, aneka ragam kuliner juga dapat dijumpai cukup melangkahkan kaki lima menit ke jalan Bayeman.  Untuk anak-anak, alon-alon Magelang maupun Taman Kyai Langgeng juga dapat ditempuh cukup berjalan kaki 10-15 menit.  Benar-benar hotel pilihan dengan harga yang tidak boros di kantong.

Hotelnya bagus, bersih dan nyaman. Pelayanannya juga OK dan pilihan sarapannya juga banyak. Lokasinya strategis di pusat kota Magelang dan dapat berjalan kaki untuk menikmati pusat kota, seperti: pecinan, alun-alun kota, dsb. text: Kamar kami sangat bersih dengan tempat tidur yang nyaman. Pilihan makan pagi juga cukup variatif (love the nasi campur!) :) Selain itu, lokasinya juga sangat strategis sehingga cukup mudah untuk mencapai pusat keramaian. Pilihan yang memuaskan!
title: Nyamaan dan strategiiss!

text:
Sejujurnya Hotel Sriti dipilih karena hotel-hotel lain di Magelang saat itu penuh, namun di luar dugaan ternyata inilah hotel yang tepat sesuai kebutuhan saya.

Lokasinya benar-benar strategis, ke pusat keramaian serta mayoritas kuliner Magelang bisa dicapai dengan jalan kaki.

Kamar yang saya ambil di-upgrade menjadi ukuran yang lebih besar (beda harga sedikit), dan kamar tersebut benar-benar luas. Yang menarik, di kamar itu terdapat jendela antara kamar mandi dan kamar tidur, mungkin sengaja dibuat seperti itu untuk tujuan-tujuan tertentu.

Sarapan yang disajikan memiliki kualitas yang baik. Meskipun variasinya yang kurang banyak, tapi yang basic seperti omelette masih ada. Staff yang menyapa kami sangatlah ramah.

Sungguh kami senang menginap disini meskipun hanya semalam.
title: Hotel bintang 3 kualitas bintang 4

text: Terletak dipusat kota dan dekat dengan pusat keramaian, cukup dengan berjalan kaki. Area hotel tidak terlalu luas, namun tertata dengan rapi dan cintik. Kualitas makanannya yg homy (rumahan) serasa bukan di hotel. Sop buntut, rawon dan minuman "wedang secang" selalu pilihan saya saat menginap. Acara keluarga maupun bisnis atau melepas penat? Hotel Sriti. Kekurangannya?Hanya pada jumlah kamar yg terbatas. Untuk harga? Ada nilai lebih dari sekedar yg dibayarkan.
title: Hotel yg representatif

text:
Hotel yang bagus di pusat kota, sarapan yang enak dan staf yang ramah, dengan kolam renang tapi setiap kali kami ingin masuk kamar kami harus meminta kunciReseptionist.
jika anda membuat reservasi mintalah kamar di lantai 2  menghadap kolam .

text: Meski hotelnya tidak terlalu besar, tapi memang benar jika hotel ini nyaman spt yg kami rasakan sewaktu menginap disini. Kamarnya bersih, karyawannya ramah dan makanan tela-tela nya enak banget. Singkong empuk dan bumbunya meresap jadi nikmat. Ini adalah salah satu recommended family hotel.
title: Senyaman di rumah

text: hotel ini memiliki lokasi yang strategis, dipusat kota... kamar hotel juga nyaman...salah satu kendala adalah signal wifi yang jelek terutama jika tdk mendapat kamar dekat lobby atau dekat pool...makanan di resto nya enak, pelayanan nya juga bagus dan bersahabat
title: hotel yang nyaman

text:
Hotel yg berada di pusat kota ini menawarkan suasana yang nyaman seperti dirumah sendiri, sampai memesan makan malam hotel sampai nambah 2x karena makanan yang di sajikan sangat enak apalagi sop iga bakar yang hangat dan nasi goreng yang pas di lidah di suasana malam magelang yang dingin. Breakfast yang bervariasi jg membuat anak-anak bisa memilih sarapan yang mereka suka. 
Mungkin yang harus diperhatikan oleh hotel adalah tangga ke lantai 2 karena masih terbuat dari kayu membuat berisik sangat menganggu saat tamu hotel naik turun.
title: Hotel yang nyaman dan sajian makanan yang lezat di Magelang

text: Ini adalah hotel yang nyaman dan sangat strategis. Di sore hari kita bisa berjalan sepanjang jalan pemuda untuk berbelanja berbagai macam barang atau sekedar cuci mata. Untuk mencari makananpun tidak perlu repot karena banyak restaurant di sekitar hotel.Semuanya dapat dicapai hanya dengan berjalan kaki.
title: Hotel nyaman dekat pertokoan

text: Dengan lokasi dekat dengan alun-alun magelang, hotel Sriti bisa menjadi pilihan untuk tempat menginap baik bagi yang melakukan perjalanan bisnis maupun perjalanan wisata dengan keluarga. Dengan tarif yang terjangkau (dan sesuai tarif perjalanan dinas tentunya, hehe), hotel Sriti merupakan hotel yang nyaman dan tidak telalu bising, di tengah area hotel terdapat kolam renang dan gazebo dengan pemandangan taman disekitarnya, asri sekali. Pelayanannya juga sangat memuaskan, semua petugas yang saya temui selalu tersenyum dan menyapa tamu, terutama petugas front office. Pokonya thumbs up deh :)
title: pelayanan yang memuaskan

text: Hotel Sriti absolutly feels like home. Kesannya kami rekam cukup baik dan memberi kesan hangat seperti keluarga sendiri. Staff sangat ramah. Lokasi di tengah kota membuat cari makan atau jalan jalan hanya selangkah. Kamarnya bersih, ,makanan cukup sederhana tetapi berkualitas. Tapi kamar VIP bermacam2 ada bathtub atau shower ada yg dengan kursi tamu. Pastikan dengan reseptionist.
title: hotel nyaman di tengah kota

text:
Jika anda berwisata ke daerah Jawa Tengah khususnya Candi Borobudur, Mendut, Sendangsono, dan sekitarnya, saya sarankan anda nginap di Hotel Sriti di Magelang. 
Hotel bintang 3 dengan pelayanan bintang 4...

Beberapa waktu lalu, kami melewatkan beberapa hari liburan kami di Di Hotel Sriti.
Disini kami ditawarkan suasana kekeluargaan dan kenyamanan seperti layaknya dirumah sendiri, dari keramahan karyawan hotel, kenyaman suasana hotel, layanan wi-fi (jadi bisa tetap eksis...), kolam renang yang bersih dan terawat, dan makanannya yg memanjakan lidah.... hhhmm serasa dirumah sendiri deh....

Letak kamarnya berhadapan dengan taman kecil, juga ada yang berhadapan dengan kolam renang sehingga dapat menjadi pilihan untuk duduk santai kala tak ada acara, atau dapat juga duduk di gazebo berbentuk Joglo sambil menikmati secangkir cappucinno, sepiring telo-telo yang nikmat (menu-menu favorit saya) atau makanan kecil dan minuman lainnya yg tidak kalah nikmatnya, bisa sambil online atau sekedar ngobrol bareng teman. 
Bagi orangtua yg datang bersama anak, dapat mengawasi anak-anaknya berenang atau bermain ayunan dari gazebo atau meja resto yang letaknya disamping kolam renang dan arena bermain.

Bagi kamu penikmat nasi goreng khususnya nasi goreng kampung (seperti saya), jangan melewatkan breakfast, disana disediakan berbagai macam makanan dari ala barat sampai ala lokal dan salah satunya adalah nasi goreng kampung yang sangat nikmat ini (saya suka sekali...), yang saat ini susah ditemui dimana-mana, atau bisa juga dipesan di restaurant hotel jika kesiangan karena tidur yang pulas. Restaurantnya pun menyediakan aneka makanan yang nikmat di lidah, enak di kantong dan pas di perut.....

Dari Hotel Sriti kami ditawarkan beberapa acara tambahan diluar rencana kami yaitu rafting di sungai Elo, dan naik sepeda menyusuri persawahan dan mencoba beberapa kerajinan (gerabah, batik). 
Sayangnya masa liburan kani sudah harus berakhir..., padahal masih banyak lagi acara yang ditawarkan... Kami akan kembali....

Thank keluarga besar Hotel Sriti, yang turut menyempurnakan liburan kami...

Semangat!!!
title: Hotel?? kok senyaman rumah sendiri...

text:
Saya menginap kurang lebih untuk 6 hari di hotel ini dan saya cukup mendapatkan pengalaman dengan bisa menempati beberapa jenis kamar yang tersedia di hotel ini mulai dari executive hingga VIP

Lobby hotel kecil namun unik, dan anda akan disambut oleh staff front office yang ramah, Secara keseluruhan kondisi kamar bagus dengan layout yang tepat, bersih serta sambutan staff hotel yang cukup hangat dan bersahabat dan siap membantu anda, selain itu hotel ini juga dilengkapi dengan kolam renang yang bersih dan gazebo kecil untuk bersantai.

Lokasi hotel cukup strategis dan berada di dekat pusat kota namun jika anda tidak memiliki kendaraan, anda harus menggunakan jasa taksi atau jika anda ingin naik kendaraan umum anda harus berjalan sebentar untuk mencapai jalan utama. saat malam hari didepan hotel banyak penjual makanan yang cukup lezat dan dengan harga yang bersahabat.

Namun ada beberapa hal yang mungkin harus diimprove untuk menambah kenyamanan penghuni hotel, seperti layanan room service disarankan harus 24 jam, bantal dan kasur ada yang berbeda (tidak standar) utk beberapa kamar yang saya tinggali dan layanan wifi saat saya menginap hanya bisa diakses diarea kolam renang dan gazebo saja, bagi saya hal diatas cukup membuat tidak nyaman. untuk layanan lainnya dan termasuk harga kamar cukup bagus

Secara keseluruhan hotel ini cukup nyaman dan direkomendasikan jika anda ingin memilih hotel saat di Magelang.
title: Salah Satu Hotel Yang Cukup Nyaman di Magelang

text:
Nice room, warm staff, interior hotel yang sangat indah serasa tinggal di rumah sendiri, udara yang sejuk, parkir yang luas, ditambah adanya wisata kuliner di depan hotel ..
kekurangannya : Lokasi yang agak sulit diketemukan dan harga yang sedikit diatas rata rata ..
but still nice hotel and recomended ..
title: Serasa di rumah

text: Bangunannya Anggun, Megah didalamnya dan indah seperti menyambut tamu di rumahnya sendiri. Dekorasi lobby dengan sepeda Ontel. Kolam renang yang asri sambil menikmati hidangan.Kenyamanan kamar dan hidangan Breakfast yang menarik. Aneka Hidangan yang lezat. Keramahan pemilik dan pelayananan yang sangat baik. Daerah sekitar Hotel nyaman untuk pejalan kaki, dekat dengan Pecinan dengan kios- kios yang lengkap untuk dapat memenuhi kebutuhan turis. Sangat strategis untuk mencapai daerah wisata, candi-candi. kami bisa berkeliling menikmati Candi Borobudur , Mendut, Prambanan. Tempat Ziarah Sendangsono.
title: Anggun, Megah, Indah seperti dirumah sendiri

text: menginap di hotel ini minggu lalu untuk tugas kantor bersama teman2 dan menurut saya dan teman2 begitu mengesankan.hotelnya nyaman dan bersih. kami jga sempat berwisata kuliner karena di sekitar hotel banyak pilihan  makanannya. Best spot saya dan teman2 di hotel adalah di pinggir kolam renang sambil makan malam dan bisa sambil browsing juga. Big thanks Sriti utk keramahan & kenyamanan nya.

text:
Jika Anda berencana untuk mengunjungi Candi Borobudur dan tidak ingin tinggal di Borobudur pastikan untuk mencari hotel yang menarik ini. Pemiliknya Yoyon dan Cinta secara pribadi melayani saya dengan baik dan selalu mencari cara untuk membuat waktu menginap Anda menjadi lebih baik.

Fasilitas dikelola dengan baik dan sangat bersih, kamarnya sangat luas dan dihias manis dengan gaya yang sangat modern.

Staf terdiri dari sekelompok anak muda yang menyenangkan dan energik yang menikmati waktunya saat bekerja di hotel dan murah senyum dengan sapaan yang hangat. Tuta dan Indah adalah yang paling manis, tetapi seluruh staf akan membuat Anda tersenyum.

Ada sebuah restoran kecil dengan dengan menu yang sangat banyak. Saya mengajar kelas memasak untuk dapur di Sateh dan seluruh staf datang untuk belajar dengan banyak tawa melihat bahasa yang saya ucapkan.

Kekurangannya sedikit, selain dekat dengan masjid sehingga panggilan shalat subuh dan malam terdengar lewat pengeras suara. Internet hanya terdapat di kolam renang dan restoran, tetapi lebih baik daripada tidak sama sekali. Saya akan membayar untuk akses dari kamar saya jika tersedia.
title: Hotel yang menarik

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini untuk semalam. Kamar bersih dan nyaman. Saya tidak memiliki masalah dengan kamar dan fasilitas hotel. Satu hal yang membuat saya kesal adalah suara karaoke dari tetangga. Saya tidak tahu asal suaranya. Sangat menyebalkan saat mereka masih memainkan musik dengan keras sampai pukul 11.30 malam. Saya tidak dapat tidur malam itu.

Jadi, apabila anda mencari tempat yang tenang untuk beristirahat, pikirkanlah lagi.
title: Kamar bagus dan bersih, namun sangat berisik di malam hari.

text:
Hotel Sriti
I love this hotel and would definitely come back. The staff were friendly and helpful. Check-in was a breeze, welcome drink and all.

My room was clean, roomy, good lighting, shower, and equipped with latest cable-TV. Bed was comfortable. After 2-day hike in the nearest mountain, I slept like 10 hours.😁

Breakfast was delicious. Swimming pool was available too. The hotel seemed to have undergone an upgrade. The inside courtyard was lovely, and there was a Javanese pendopo by the pool. Lots of parking spots.
Magelang was a small town worth exploring, and this hotel just capped my trip in an awesome way. Keep it up!
title: Recommended Hotel in Magelang

text:
We were traveling to Magelang during weekend and was referenced by our colleagues about this nice hotel, so we choose to stay for 2 nights in this hotel.

At first impression, the hotel was nice & clean. They also have a small pool and art shop, which is very nice.

Our room was spacious, clean, homey and well decorated. The room have air con, cable tv with international station, and electric jar. They also give 2 bottle of mineral water, coffee, tea & sugar as a complimentary.

The bathroom was also clean and spacious. 2 clean bath towel & 2 face towel were provided.

The breakfast was out of expectation. The dining room was very comfy and the food was excellent.

Our 2 nights were without any complaints and our family enjoys our stay. A great choice and definitely our top picks in Magelang.

text:
Good medium sized hotel in Magelang area.  We stayed there for 2 nights with family staying in Family room.  Funny thing that the rooms only numbered in two-digit but great service from their staff.  The room consists of 1 twin bed and 1 king bed, plus another sofa bed.  Good sized bathroom too with separate toilet and shower sections.  Pool is available for kids to play.  Breakfast selection is decent, and the restaurant is not too crowded even during the morning hours.

We had an issue with room lighting, and took the staff very quick to get it fixed.  Fully enjoyed our time there.  Overall, great hotel and will come back again.
title: Quaint hotels, great service

By the price it's a little high, you can find another luxury hotel with the same price, but because the environment. For me the price is okay.
title: Quick Stay at Hotel Sriti

text:
Had a nice stay in this cultural hotel last week for my short trip. 

This hotel has a unique ambiance of cultural and natural atmosphere. 

The room is spacious and comfortable. I think the size of the room is beyond above standard room in other 3 or 4 stars hotel.

All the people here were very nice, helpful, polite, and always full of smile everytime. It trully make me feel at home with their warm welcome and spirit. 

They served indonesian breakfast with various items which is very good. It also has egg station, various choices of juice, etc. Overall it was a good breakfast.

One more thing you need to know is that there is no elevator in this hotel so it would be easier if you get a room in the first floor for more convenience access.
title: Nice hospitality, spacious room, great stay

text:
We stay in this hotel for a short period,  as we arrived in late afternoon and left the hotel after breakfast. 

The hospitality and the service from the receptionist is the best. A staff guide us to the room. We booked via Agoda.  We was given room near the pool.  Our children really love it.  The pool is also children friendly.  Small and not too deep (1.58m)

The only service need to be upgraded is the Internet connection.  As we stay in a short period,  we do not bother the Internet connection. 

The room is clean and tidy. 
The bathroom is also simple and clean. 

Recommended for families
title: The best service 3 star  hotel

text:
This hotel was very nice. Located in the Magelang City Center and near Chinatown, you could easily find good and tasty restaurant for your lunch and dinner. 

The staff was very nice, friendly and helpful. The room was quite big with good and bright lightning, clean. Bathroom is also clean and nice. 

Breakfast was also tasty. Buffet-style, combination between Indonesian and Western-style food.
title: Very Nice Hotel, Worth to Stay there

text: The hotel located in the city center, near Magelang City Square, culinary center, and easy to find. Staff very friendly, helpfull and very well-trained. Fair price for the room, its clean and tidy. The pool also suited for family and the food have a good taste also
title: Great Location

text: On a family trip we ended up in Magelang. We found a good hotel with resonable pricing. Clean rooms and swimming pool. Very friendly staff and en good breakfast made our visit to Magalang better as axpected.
title: Sriti for one night

text:
Plenty of roadside stalls around for local grub. Or you could order room service - costs more than the local eateries but still very reasonable and nice. Service is good all round - from the reception to the restaurant. If you need to rent a motorbike or arrange for airport transfer, they can sort it all out for you.

Room is clean and the bed and pillows were comfortable. Breakfast wasn't too bad at all - tasty and a nice variety of indo and western. At the price we paid, definitely worth the stay. Many visiting indonesians also stay here with young children and always it's nice to have a holiday amongst locals.
title: Great value hotel

text:
Located in the heart of the Magelang City. The hotel is reasonably priced, and have a nice pool to dip in, and it was nice to sip coffee and smoke near the pool side. 
Stayed at the family suite located right next to the swimming pool, and thoroughly enjoyed it. 
The staffs were nice, polite and helpful with a touch of Central Javanese Hospitality.
The hotel provides transport services to Borobudur Temple and other temples too at a reasonable price, cheaper than the ones in Yogyakarta.
Recommended hotel to stay for its Nice service, reasonable price, nice quiet room and accessibility.
title: Nice Mid Range Hotel with the Javanese Hospitality

text: We've been here for many times...and this hotel keeps improving ! Nice staffs and perfect location near with old culinaries and many shops just within minutes by walking. Nice small swimming pool and traditional breakfast. Our first choice hotel in Magelang !!
title: Hotel Sriti in the heart of Magelang

text: Magelang is my home town. Now I live in the USA but often come to Magelang. Despte the plethora of new hotels in Magelang including Armada, for me there is only one hotel to chose: Sriti. Over the years the hotel has constantly been upgraded as the owners Yoyon and Shinta are perfectionists and want our stay to be very pleasant. Upgrades include safe deposit box, excellent wifi , better showers and the buffet breakfast which is very lavish and is something to write home about. The quality equals that in the best hoels, with genuine Indonesian specialties which i  know from my schoolchild but also western choices including an omelet station. Throughout the day a welcome drink awaits the weary traveler in the lobby. The hotel is strategically located and a trip to Borobudur temple can pleasantly avoid the traffic jams which now engulf the Armada shopping and hotel complex in Magelang. The swimming pool is very inviting. The hotel is within walking distance of the the three OHD museums. owned by the famous and largest art collector of Indonesia. Within walking distance one can find many excellent restaurants serving Indonesian and western food and within two blocs is the main shopping street of Magelang, Jalan Pemuda also known as Pecinan (Chinatown)
title: the best value hotel in Magelang for the rates

text: A smooth ride from Jogjakarta airport to Magelang Sriti hotel with the prearranged hotel pick-up service. Upon arrival at the hotel we were welcomed by the friendly reception staff with a complimentary drink. We got a room as requested when booking. The room is clean and cozy. The buffet breakfast is great with a selection oft local gourmet food. During our 7 days stay we had tried many different local food because the selection changed every day. We also had a few delicious lunch and dinner at the Gazebo next to the swimming pool. Relaxing with beer from the hotel or BYO wine. The friendly hotel staff and management make you feel at home while staying at hotel Sriti. The hotel is located centrally within walking distance from most tourist attractions: Aloen2, OHD Museum, Mt Tidar, China Town and Gedong Boender. The hotel can also arrange day tours to the Borobudur or Prambanan temples or other activities like rafting, cycling, hiking, etc....
title: Feeling welcomed in Sriti hotel for 7 nights

photos.caption: Old stile building with modern rooms

text:
Stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. It was really comfort and clean rooms, we had a good time sleep. We booked direct to its website, 1 suite room and 1 executive room with total IDR 1.285.000/night for 2 rooms including breakfast for 5 persons. The suite room could be occupied 3 persons with area 60m2. It had small living room, 2 TVs, fridge, 2 ACs, also complete amenities.... truly worth the price. Fast check-in and check-out, the staffs were friendly.

The breakfast was delicious with many choices. Love the taste! We tried Sriti burger served with french fries for IDR 25.000, and a seafood fried rice for IDR 28.000, big crepes for IDR 13.000... not expensive for hotel rate. When needed mineral water, a bottle of 1,5 ml was only IDR 6.500. 

The best was it has a clean swimming pool. I thought that the owner was an art lover due to the interior of the hotel was so nice.

The only worst thing was its wifi connection. We couldn't connect at all. It wasn't a big problem for us but it was for international tourists.

Many food stalls and restaurants surround the hotel. The hotel didn't has lift, but the staff would like to help us with the baggages, just don't forget to give tips =D.
We requested a room in the first floor which facing swimming pool for the executive room due to our grandma, she couldn't walk too far. The suite room located at the second floor.

I will definitely stay here again and recommend it.
title: Comfort and Clean Hotel

text:
Stayed for 14 days - the bad: very slow if any internet, pools closes for 2 days to 'clean'; no hot water during the day; will put you in the worst rooms (no window, noisy, etc) even when 1/2 the rooms are vacant; paid for VIP room and apparently there is not such thing; the rooms with a window, couch, decent view all stay vacant no matter how many times you request them and offer to pay any amount of money (you walk past them every day and they're vacant), the evening service in the restaurant is ridiculous - 40 minutes to get a beer, and 3 meals all served 10 minutes apart.
The OK: the staff is friendly and tries, but apparently management is clueless; rooms are clean, breakfast is good; location is close to the main shopping area, golf, and restaurants (Bond cafe was the best). Puri Asri is overall superior other than the location.
title: Clean, but won't return

text:
Overall clean hotel, nice staff, and very good breakfast compare to other hotel in mgl . Keep it up!! 

Will be better if they provide 24 hours room service  , it's difficult to find restaurant in the  middle of night .
title: Nice and Clean Hotel

text:
Sriti is a nice hotel in the middle of Magelang. It was spotlessly clean, the rooms not too small, and it even boasts a sizeable pool.The staff was very courteous and spoke good English. Breakfast was plenty and delicious. It could have been perfect hadn't there been the total breakdown of in-house wifi. For the entire stay it was not possible to get a wifi connection better than 200..400 bits/second, and even that dropped continuously!
The staff from reception was eager to help but clueless. They knew only that there were 4 SSIDs that could be tried but all were equally bad. Nobody knew how to reset the routers, or where they even were. There was no troubleshooting protocol or tech support contact available. If you need reliable internet access then Sriti might not be for you. Otherwise I can wholeheartedly recommend it.
title: Clean & comfortable hotel with unusable wifi

text: The hotel is clean and it is centrally located, in front of the hotel, in the evening there are many food vendors so it is easy to get the food. It's a family hotel where locals usually stay on weekends.  I like its cleanliness. The rooms are set in the green location. The standard room doesn't have shower but the small tub where you can take the water using a dipper. The tap water has both cold and warm water. Breakfast is nice, Indonesian food as well as bread. Staffs are good but response was late when I sent them email confirming payment. They responded after I made phone call.
title: clean hotel, centrally located

text: I stayed here for free because a local english school payed for the stay for me. So free is good or even best by definition. But if I would've payed for this hotel with my own money, I'm not sure that it's the best value you can get for the money. I would prefer hostel - it would be cheaper and conditions would be not very different. But it's a question of hotel vs hostel, so I'm not sure if it's relevant. So about the hotel and my stay - everything was ok, not extraordinary, but ok. The hotel had a nice pool and a good breakfast. The staff was friendly. Room could be better. I'm not sure about the location - I don't know anything about the city.
title: Title

text:
Me and my husband stayed in Magelang for IVF program at Gladiool hospital, we chose Sriti for my long stay for almost a week now and maybe will add another week during my IVF treatment.
With affordable price, we stayed in Executive room, upper stairs with huge windows.
The only complaint was the shower was not too hot at night.  
The staffs were excellent! They greet every time we pass them, they served us as we are their VVIP guests. 
They allowed us to change the room every time we got bored and need to change the view.
The distance to Gladiool hospital is only 5 mins walk, very close. 
Further, we don't have to be worried of food since restaurants and street food are nearby.
Overall, we satisfied :)

P.S : they also had another hotel link near to Borobudur, it's a resort and we are allowed to visit for swimming or spa, and they have shuttle car for free every 9.00 a.m and return by 4.00 p.m
title: Exellent Staffs, Comfortable and Clean room

text:
Sriti Hotel is ideally located in the small "Chinatown" area of Magelang. The rooms are arranged around a nice swimming pool and beautiful wooden cafe gazebo. Breakfast was served in a pleasant 2nd floor room. The hotel offers shuttle service to Borobudur, which is very convenient. Sriti Hotel is a great "value for money" place. Highly recommended!

There are several Chinese restaurants surrounding the hotel, so getting something to eat is easy. The main road, Jalan Pemuda, is a few minutes away. Take an angkot (4,000 rp) to Artos Mall in the southern part of the city. There are direct Damri buses (50,000 rp) to the Yogyakarta airport at the Wisata Hotel, which leave about once every hour.
title: Clean, Comfortable and Homey Hotel

text: Our stay at Sriti Hotel was really worth. The service was excellent and the place was so cozy. Sriti Hotel located in a strategic area in the heart of Magelang City. We just need to walk 3minutes to OHD Museum and 5 minutes walk to the China Town. Also in the morning we can can easily reach the morning market called Pasar Tukangan which has various kinds of food for your breakfast. Sriti Hotel sure is an amazing place to stay in Magelang City.
title: Comfortable hotel

text: Hotel sriti offered great stays for our family trip. The rooms were very comfortable and it's convenient to get around magelang from its location. They also offer free mini bars in the hotel . Staffs were very helpful and nice. The hotels and bathrooms were nicely presented and clean. Their breakfast were really delicious. For the price we paid, their services were beyond of our expectations.
title: Best hotel in magelang

text: I booked a double bedroom hotel room when i went to Magelang on Sriti Hotel. I like the Interior design of the poolside, the room especially the bathroom. The shower current is so nice and we can adjusting the water temprature really fast according what we want. The breakfast is nice, located on 2nd floor. We can choose either  Indonesian foods like chicken porridge, fried rice, even fried noodle or western breakfast. But, i hope the Hotel will change the margarine to butter spread. Overall when i'll back to Magelang, i'll booked this Hotel again
title: Nice Hotel with affordable price

text:
Every time we visit magelang, we would always book our rooms in Sriti hotel. We feel that this hotel is very convenient and affordable. Moreover, the service we receive is certainly more than we expected and paid for. 
We never have the to call in the technician to our rooms as everything is always working fine. 
It is also located in a quiet area yet close to desired destination. 
Staff and service never fails to make us feel very welcomed and served. 
The price is more than just reasonable! Hence, we would always choose sriti hotel and also recommend people to stay there, whenever they visit magelang.
title: Convenient and Affordable Stay

text: We stayed for 2 nights at hotel sriti. Our rooms were very spacious, clean and comfortable. The staffs were friendly and profesional. We love their breakfast too as we had the traditional nasi liwet, which tasted authentic. Hotel sriti has strategic location and so it is easy to get around magelang city. There are plenty of shops in front of the hotel. We highly recommended this hotel if you staying in magelang.
title: Excellent services and strategic location

text:
I stayed here with my husband and my son (toddler). 
The staff were very friendly and helpful. 
The food were delicious and had fair price.
Nice place, clean rooms, small but enjoyable swimming pools. 
We had accident there, my son broke a plate. Fortunately, they have very good procedures. We had been charged for the broken plate in a reasonable price. 
The only matters was the restaurant at 2nd floor. Quite dangerous if we have very active toddler.
title: Nice and Friendly Staff

text: Good rooms, nice wooden work, good restaunt, pool area for swimmers, kids corner, free wifi, clean rooms, I recommend for short stay. The food is good and you can get to grab a beer too which is difficult to find in Indonesia in most of the hotels
title: Nice to stay in city

text: Have been staying here on my short trip recently. The staff is very friendly and the check in process ia quick. The room is clean.  However I will need to be realistic when staying at 3 stars hotel. The aircon inside the room is not cool enough. The furniture is quite old including the bed. Location of this hotel is good. If I may have other opinion I would rate this hotel as 3.5 but it is not enough to make me rate it as 4. However overall, this hotel is quite nice and the price is very reasonable.
title: Friendly hotel

text:
I visited Hotel Sriti for one night stay in Magelang with my family. We arrived pretty late at night, but the staffs there are very helpful with our check-in and luggage so that we could swiftly rest in our rooms within minutes. The room where I stayed was spacious, comfortable, very clean, and Wi-Fi accessible.

After a good night's sleep, I pleasantly found that my room was located right in front of the restaurant. The hotel served us great quality buffet breakfast with great service!

Hotel Sriti is also located close to Magelang shopping centres for your convenience. It is highly recommended to stay at Hotel Sriti on your next visit to Magelang :)
title: A lovely short stay

text:
We stayed at this hotel during our tour through Java. After a long drive from Bandung 14 exhausting hours, we were told that this hotel is a good place to stay.

We were welcomed very nicely and we enjoyed the very modern and clean hotel room and we loved the pool to withstand the hot Indoensian weather.

Can only recommend this hotel!
title: Great Hotel

text: I spent a 3-excellent-day trip in Magelang. My friends recommended me to stay in Sriti Hotel, and I tried because it's located near the Chinatown. I could walk around the town easily. I am glad with the facilities here. It has a nice swimming pool with a stunning view, especially at night, when all the yellow lights are on. Another thing that I like is the clean environment. They always pay attention to the cleanliness, especially for the bathroom. Can't recommend this villa enough! People just need to go here to experience what I feel.
title: A Stunning Hotel Near the Chinatown

text:
I stayed in Amata Borobudur Resort for 3 nights. This resort gives  me facilities such as a free shuttle to the centre of Magelang (Downtown) ,with a convenient car and a driver, it  only takes 20 minutes.
Sriti Hotel has a good location,precisely in the of Magelang down town. Just transit for a while, Sriti hotel gives the best impression for me, the young staffs always smile and willing to help, and the Wifi work at most of the areas even logging into overseas sites.
It has a very nice atmosphere, friendly people, quick responses . The Rooms and interior are clean, neat and nice, while the rooms’ design are spacious and there are a lot of functional compartments and racks. The bathroom’s  design is also nice and efficient. If you need great place to lay back or rest with a reasonable price Sriti Hotel is the choice. Not only having  a  nice swimming pool with the ample of sunbed, food good, with green and clean are a welcoming atmosphere.
It’s highly recommended for the next stay in Magelang.
title: A Classical Hotel Precisely in Magelang Downtown

text: My son and I stayed for 5 nights during my holiday on December 2014. My impression is that this hotel is nice, clean and the staff if friendly and helpful. The superior room we stayed is OK and at the best condition for this type of room. However, we might stay at executive room next time:-). Location of the hotel is perfect, close to the centre of the city that makes us easy to find anything e.g. ATM, shopping centre, or food court.
title: Nice hotel with friendly and helpful staff

They also keep your original ID during you rstay although you have paid the room in advance. I hope they can improve this.

text: Despite an increase of hotels in the region of Magelang this hotel still ranks as one of the best we've stayed in, and that is going back to 2001.The rooms are spotless, the staff so friendly and attentive and there are amenities to suit all the family. The swimming pool is generously sized and with a canopied dining area you can be served food or drinks while relaxing by the pool. The hotel is located within walking distance to the town center, which is convenient considering the lack of taxis in the region. Traveling further afield to places of interest usually requires hiring a taxi for a day. All in all I have had no problems with this hotel, which my family and I have stayed in every two years when we are in the town of Magelang.
title: Hotel Sriti. Still a gem.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Suggested by a friend to stay at this hotel since this hotel located not far from Borobudur tample and I didn't regret any single second that I spent in this hotel. It was 5 days that well spent. I had a great time to relax and do some activities such as cycling and rafting. It was awesome. They provide indonesian food as the breakfast at most of the time and I really like it
title: Small hotel with warm welcome and service that makes me feel at home

text:
Our stay at Hotel Sriti was fantastic ,  the rooms were spotlessly clean, had plenty of room.
There was only me and my husband in our room, we had a huge King bed, with a single chair and desk, and a large tv,  also a large bathroom, it has a fridge and coffee making facilities.  The bed was super comfy, and we both had great sleeps.   The staff couldn't be more friendly or helpful, nothing seemed to be a problem.   It is a small hotel which has a small family feel (the owner even sat down for a chat at breakfast in the lovely dining room one morning)
The hotel has a lovely pool area with a gazebo and bar in it.
The hotel is very close to some great restaurants and not to far from the temples and shopping, the hotel also has a car and driver, so you can explore.   We loved our stay at Hotel Sriti and look forward to another visit.
title: Could not be happier!

text:
Magelang is a small, friendly town near the cultural Buddhist monument Borobudur. But since some years Magelang also owns a museum of modern and contemporary Indonesian art, the OHD Museum, named after its owner Dr. Oei Hong Djien. I stayed several times in Sriti Hotel during exhibitions that took place in this museum. At those times it was easy to meet other people of the art world in Sriti Hotel, especially in the nice dining room. The rooms are very practical and clean, and the service is friendly. The mild climate in Magelang adds to the pleasure of staying there. So I can recommend the hotel for anybody on a cultural trip through Jawa.

Helena Spanjaard
Art Historian
title: In Hotel Sriti I feel at home

text: I found this hotel a good hotel because the rooms were always clean and tidy. There is enough room in the hotel and the dining room is clean and breakfast is completely tidy.The The staff is friendly.
title: Hotel Sriti

text: Located nearby the citysquare of Magelang, Sriti offers a peaceful and friendly atmosphere. It was valuable for me to do staycation, in which I could do my work while away from home and office. The staffs were very helpful as usual. The room and public space were clean and tidy.
title: New Year Staycation

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
It was our first time visiting Magelang n our first time staying at Sriti Hotel (We stayed in 2 VIP adjoining rooms for 4 nights 5 days from 23 Dec - 25 Dec 2022). We had a wonderful and a very pleasant stay. First time we arrived at this hotel, it was drizzling, and cool, but we felt a welcoming n cozy atmosphere, especially because we were greeted by the staffs who directly offered their helps to carry our baggages. Our rooms was besides the swimming pool so we had to passed the restaurant which is besides the swimming pool, the gurgling water sounds from 3 lil fountains and Christmas songs made the environment became more warm. The hotel has a very nice designs, love the rooms, especially the bathrooms which have a bath tub in each of it. I love the moments when having a warm bath in it. We've got  free breakfast from our room bookings, the foods were all delicious and variative every day, it's the combination with the Javanese foods, n I was very happy when I saw "jamu beras kencur" LOL.
Finally, I felt it was the right choice to spend our Christmas in Sriti, not only because we really felt the Christmas atmosphere by the Christmas songs that were played everyday, but also because in every corner of the hotel, we could see Christmas decorations.
All the staffs are very friendly, polite and courteous, trying to do their best to help us. Every morning, I was reminded to have a cleaning services for our rooms, which is I think one of the excellent things we got there. Even when we had our breakfast, my husband said "this is our first time to be served like this (the staffs offered to bring our foods to the table we chose to have our breakfast at)"
We want to express our gratitude especially to mbak Linda whom I always communicate to, since I made the reservation first time. You've been a great help for us along our stay in Sriti.
All in all, I just wanna say, Sriti Hotel Magelang is highly recommended! It's maybe a 3 stars hotel, but for us it is a 5 stars hotel in terms of service, cleanliness, and designs.
Well done, Sriti! Keep up the good work! Thank you for having us.
title: A 3 stars hotel, but a 5 stars taste

title: Hotel Sriti Magelang - Great Place!!

text:
Yesterday, we just had a dinner for wedding celebration. So far, It was fun for our family. Hotel crews helped us for the preparation. They served great meals and service. Even in pandemic condition, they treated us in proper protocol for avoiding covid 19. We also reserved for 2 rooms near the swimming pool. They were so great and clean, but maybe hotel need to fix the wifi. Sometimes, we had obstacles to connect the wifi. But, overall staying in Sriti Hotel was totally great and hotel crews were so helpful. See you next time!
thank you!

Mr & Mrs Gilang
title: Wedding Dinner in Sriti Hotel

text: We stayed at Hotel Sriti for five nights and enjoyed every minute of it. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Always smiling, they addressed us by name and tried their best to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The rooms were very clean and tidy, and the bed nice and firm. We absolutely loved the buffet breakfast. It offered different traditional Javanese dishes every morning, and they even had an egg station where they made delicious omelettes. The drinks were great, too - on a rainy afternoon we had a lovely hot chocolate and fresh strawberry-sirsak juice. The location of the hotel was convenient, close to everything. In all, we had a fantastic stay and would highly recommend Hotel Sriti!
title: Excellent hotel in Magelang!

text:
I love the ambience and love the pool. The frontdesk very helpfull with so many things. About my early chekin or even my late checkin. The room very clean and neat. 
Theirs breakfast isvary, from tradisional drink "jamu" until western food. And the price is affordable.
title: Clean and the frontdesk very helpfull!

text:
I have stayed in Sriti Hotel several times during my visits to Magelang within the past 2 decades.
From a small simple inn, it developed and transformed into a modern and attractive hotel.
The owners of Sriti, also own another hotel and a small resort in the vicinity. Sriti is located in a quiet environment. The two store buildings including the rooms are very clean, well equipped and nicely decorated.
It has a small garden in the middle of its complex with a very clean swimming pool. There is also a coffee shop at the second floor facing the pool. The food is delicious and the service is very good.
When you do visit Magelang one day, Sriti would be a good choice to stay.
title: Small and Beautiful Sriti

text:
I was very satisfied with my stay here. The main reason I chose this hotel was because of its location,  it acted a central hub for visiting the various volcanoes/mountains surrounding the area as well as Borobudur, which was 25 minutes away. Magelang is actually closer to the popular landmarks than Yogyakarta (except Prambanan Temple).

First thing I noticed was this place is VERY clean, which was not very common in my experience with other Indonesian hotels of the same price range. 

The staff is super friendly, everyone was cordial and attentive. I was greeted with smiles left and right!

My room was adequately spacious and comfortable, with a view of the pool as a bonus.

Breakfast was included with my stay, the buffet-style dining area offers a solid variety and also western/indonesian options. As a bonus I noticed most of the upscale restaurants magelang has to offer are mostly located within a 10 minute drive of the hotel. 

I highly recommend this hotel, if I ever stop by Magelang again I will definitely book here again.
title: Great Hotel With Many Amenities For An Affordable Price

text:
It was a nicely decorated boutique hotel, no wonder tourists love Hotel Sriti. The service was great, they welcomed us warmly even at 1 a.m. and helped us with transportation issues. They texted me through WhatsApp asking about room cleaning, that's cool. Oh, and their breakfast? Delicious! Don't skip it!

Though they mistakenly thought I wanted to check-out just because someone checking-out said s/he from Room 12 (my room) and not confirming to me first. It was just a small silly mistake tho. Another minus: they only have stairs. So if you have weak legs, make sure to ask for room(s) on first floor.

I booked an executive room with breakfast, but surprisingly the room they gave me was far from expectation. A friend who booked the same room without breakfast said they got a better looking room downstairs. My room was kinda... old? I'm not sure but it definitely didn't meet my expectation. It was a twin bed room but they put the beds so close there was no space in between. One of the window couldn't be closed, guess that's the reason why the AC wasn't cold even if it's on 18 degree. The shower room has no curtain so the water splash is causing a mess.
title: Nicely decorated, great breakfast, but so many stairs

text:
We (me and my wife) stayed for a week in this hotel on 4th – 11th September 2017.
A little bit background: both of us are professional hotelier who live and work in Dubai for more than 10 years now. We are frequent travelers and lucky to be able to experience many different hotels in many different countries. I am an Indonesian and my wife is foreigner hence this review is a combination of local and international guest perspective about the hotel.
First of all, we visit Magelang every year as my family live in the city. We always choose different hotels in Magelang because we want to have different experience on each visit, however our last stay in Sriti made us want to share this review with all of you if you plan to visit Magelang.
“Hotel Sriti is the best place to stay in Magelang if you considering value for money.”
Here is why :
Pro’s.
+ Service. (All the hotel employees are warm and friendly. More importantly they are professional, and helpful without being intrusive. You have both privacy and convenient!)
+ Ambiance. (If you want a hotel stay that feels like home, this is a perfect place for you)
+ Location. (It is located in the middle of the city. You can get anything at anytime within the walking distance. Fancy a shopping time? 300m away is the shopping district. Fancy some street food for breakfast/lunch/dinner? there are more than 20 different vendors within 200m. Ops, there is no spa in the hotel, but do you feel like to rejuvenate yourself with some treatment? 50m just across the street there is a spa with unbelievably affordable price.)
+ Value for money. (Within the same price range in Magelang, this hotel is the best one)
+Breakfast. (Good authentic Indonesian food for breakfast. The hotel cleverly selects the menu that is friendly for foreigner and satisfies the local palate at the same time)
There are few standard 3 stars hotel facilities worth mentioning that is available: swimming pool, room service, laundry, meeting room, restaurant, and pool bar.
Ofcourse not everything is rainbow and butterflies in Hotel Sriti and it will be great if the management consider improving below points based on our experience:
1.	Wifi is unstable up to the point of frustrating. We end up using our 4g data package from our mobile phone to connect to internet. We enjoy our stay because we are on vacation, if I were on my business trip, this point will be a big letdown for me.
2.	Swimming pool shower area is worth to look into. I brought my family to enjoy the pool and my little brother mentioned the pool shower is barely working and there is no hot water. He ends up using the shower in my hotel room.
Yes there is pro’s and con’s like anything else in life however like I mention earlier, this is the best place to stay if you value your money.
We will definitely come back to the Hotel Sriti.
title: Value for money - excellent service

text:
I stayed one night on 21st august 2014 in their VIP room (no. 2). I'm deeply impressed with this hotel, since i walk in there's hassle free for check in. 
Only took 5 minutes by the lovely receptionist to accomodate me (i booked online), i stayed just across the front office
The room is not spacious but large enough, for vip room you can choose either bathroom with shower or bathtub (i choose the latter). Room clean dan all standart amenities provided, bathroom very clean and come with hairdryer. The bed is comfy and i sleep well although for light sleeper maybe annoyed by occasional noise from front office.
The pool is cool and water clear, seems cleaned often..
Breakfast is not very various but enough with good taste & quality (better than some 4* i stayed) all the while the waiter keep asking me for suggestion and bringing me my coffee. 
Location wise it's located at the centre of magelang and there's nice reflexology just across the hotel.
The hotel vibrate some cozy and homey feeling which i love very much than just plain luxury hotel. 
Absolutely nice stay and will be my first choice in Magelang.
They also offer bicycling / rafting tours.
Oh btw all the desk officer is very pretty (+1 for eye candy).

text:
When we arrived after a day traveling we expected a nice hotel, but everything was good. Our bags where placed in our big room. The airco and the beds where just fine.

The only problem was the WiFi at swimming pool. Something was broken so there was no internet. And I think the bar at the swimming pool closes to early. We cam back from our diner and I want to drink some coffee at swimming pool, but the bar closed at 8 :00 PM. And the espresso machine was also not working anymore.

The people in the hotel do everything for you. I asked at 11:00 PM for a packet of cigarets and the staff was already walking.
title: Good hotel, but ...

text:
I stayed here for almost 9 days (1 - 9 July 2014) and the staffs called me by name and they acknowledge what I like and I do not like.
The hotel is very homy. The rooms is great and spacious and cleaned everyday.
But I think the TV size is too small. AC working in  a good condition, as well as the hot and cold water in the shower and wash basin.
Mattress, pillow, blanket are very comfortable. My husband like it so much.
Breakfast food choices also great, they also have egg station, but I noticed all food became not hot enough by 8.30 am till buffet closing (maybe not enough burner in the chafing dish).

The training staff or daily worker in the restaurant need to be supervised more and also the room service menu need to be changed as there are many stains in the menus. Also the wording in the menu need to be checked (a lot of missed typo).
The orange pillow and orange runner on the top of the bed a bit smelly (seems like not being washed for a while)

Overall I will definitely coming back to this hotel if I will go to Magelang, it is worth for money and the service was excellent. Thanks to all the staffs who in charge during my stay, especially FO Manager (miss Carla ?) and also the other staffs from restaurants and other department.
title: GREAT HOTEL

text:
Sriti is a clean and safe hotel with a very attentive and friendly staff. As return customers, we have been pleased with our stay there. The facilities are great and they are constantly making improvements and upgrades to the hotel. They have a good restaurant that serves free breakfast as well as a nice swimming pool. There are also plenty of restaurants and shops around within walking distance.

The hotel is a great jumping off point for exploring much of central Java because of their location more or less in the middle of central Java. Just to the south we took a trip to see the ancient Temple of Borobudur. We also took day trips as far south as Yogyakarta to see Prambanan Temple and to the east to see the active smoking volcano Merapi and its quieter sister Merbabu. There is a road (Ketep pass) that affords incredible views of both volcanoes. On a separate stay, we have gone to see Dieng Plateau area with its ancient temples, scenic mountains, meadows and volcanic lakes. To the north, the bustling city of Semarang is also within reach. There is a lot to see and explore in the area.

The hotel staff can advise more adventurous tourists on local hikes, bicycle rides and even river rafting. During my stay I was fortunate to be able to climb Gunung Merbabu, which the hotel arranged. They also arranged an early morning trip to a special location to take pictures of the sunrise over Borobudur. Unfortunately it turned out to be an overcast morning. However, it gives us a reason to return here again some day.
title: Excellent value, great location.

text:
Two times of staying in Magelang, Sriti hotel was became our destination.

The name of Sriti is like the name of a cheerful little bird. Sriti hotel with not so big location but joyful with the enviroment thats full of welcome, clean , comfort and neat. It is located in the middle of the city but neverthless is still quiet.

Eventhough it doesn't provide that many facilities, but swimming in the pool and using the wifi connection that's available around the pool, could be one option to release stress and relaxing.

With a not so high cost, we can still enjoy different kind of menu option which is very delicious and tasteful for the tongue.
title: Good service

text: Whether you're you are visiting Borobudur Temple, or tasting the local central Java delicacies, Sriti Hotel remains the best place for you to relax after a day long of travelling around the area. Sriti Hotel is conveniently located in central Magelang, the room was very clean and big,  the breakfast offers a large selection of both Indonesian and western food, and the staff was very nice and helpful. definitely will visit Sriti again for another trip.
title: Strategic, Cozy, and Cool

text:
Organized by hotel Sriti, we follow bicycle tour through the City of Magelang and Borobudur temple. Capture the natural early morning beuty of the topical trees, plants and flowers, the green terrace of rice fields and experience the life in bustling village araund the Borobudur Area.

The room of Hotel Sriti was very clean. The facilities are not very completed but well managed. It's very easy to fine food near hotel. Hotel rate is reasonable. All the staff are helpful.
title: Special experience in Magelang

text:
For a small town like Magalang this is quite a nice hotel. The rooms are a bit small but well maintained and clean. No wifi in the rooms though, you would have to use the lobby or the swimming pool area. Bicycles are available for a price on rent.
Breakfast selection also was quite good.

text: Auf dem Weg nach Jogjakarta machte ich einen Abstecher in Magelang, einer kleinen Stadt Mitteljavas. Mein Aufenthalt war nur kurz, aber sehr eindrucksvoll. Sriti bietet sehr ruhige Atmoshpäre, überall ist es sehr sauber, die MitarbeiterInnen sind sehr nett, freundlich und hilfsbereit.
title: Kleines, aber feines Hotel

text:
Nur eine Nacht habe ich in diesem Hotel übernachtet, aber einen guten Eindruck habe ich bekommen. Hotel Sriti befindet sich in einer ruhigen Stadt Mitteljavas, Magelang. Von dort kann man den buddhistischen Tempel Borobudur leicht erreichen. Nicht so weit vom Hotel gibt es ein Kunstmuseum. In 10 Minuten Gehzeit findet man ein interresantes chinesisches Gebetshaus neben dem Stadtplatz oder "alun-alun".
Hotel Sriti selbst bietet eine entspannende Atmosphäre an. Die MitarbeiterInnen sind sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Das Essen im Restaurant hat mich gut geschmäckt. Wenn Du im Café den Tag ausklingen lassen willst, probier mal "Martabak Roll"!
title: Ein sehr angenehmes, feines Hotel

text: Wij hebben een erg prettig verblijf gehad bij Hotel Sriti. De eigenares en het personeel zijn erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. De kamers zijn schoon en fijn om in te verblijven. Ook een prettig en mooi zwembad. Het lokale eten dat het hotel aanbiedt is erg lekker en vers klaargemaakt.
title: Mooi, fijn hotel en vriendelijk personeel

text:
Отличный отель, если вы хотите гулять по городу или у вас есть дела в центре города. Изюминка дизайна отеля -  исторический экскурс во времена правления голландцев, но номера - современные. Завтрак - отличный выбор: от простых каш, которые подойдут для малышей, до самых острых индонезийских национальных блюд.
Минус - цена отеля 400 000 рп - немного дороговато для маленького города.
title: Хороший отель в центре города

text: Op speciale uitnodiging heb ik een traditionele Javaanse bruiloft bijgewoond in de buurt van Magelang. Mijn verblijf in Sriti hotel voelt als een grote familie die 24/7 voor je klaar staat. Heerlijke kamer, ontbijt, behulpzaam personeel maakten deze 2 weken tot een onvergetelijke trip naar Java.
title: Thuiskomen bij Hotel Sriti

text: Chambre confortable, bon petit déjeuner, accueil du personnel chaleureux. Il faut sortir de la ville (peu d'intérêt) pour profiter de la campagne et du paysage des environs de Magelang. La randonnée jusqu'au Candi Selogrio (tout petit temple) est très belle et au milieu des rizières !
title: Bon hôtel pour une courte étape

text: Erg goed hotel! Goed ontbijt, schone ruime kamers en zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel. Van eigenaar tot schoonmaakpersoneel. Eigenaar heeft ons nog een lift gegeven vanaf zijn andere hotel, Amata Borobudur, erg tof. Eten van de kaart is ook zeer smakelijk. Echte aanrader!
title: Uitstekend hotel!

text: Waar moet ik beginnen ?? Onthaal was al een feest. Zeer vriendelijk personeel die er voor zorgen dat het aan niets ontbreekt. Schone kamers, airco, heerlijk zwembad en bediening. Alleen al bij het begin van ontbijt was onze dag al geslaagd.Ieder moment van de dag een glimlach waardoor je jezelf zeer welkom voelt. Niets is teveel gevraagd. Moest wel erg wennen in het begin aan deze voor ons onbekende manier van gastvrijheid. Alles word geregeld of het nou een fietstaxi, taxi, busje, fietstocht door de stad Magelang is , het personeel staat direct klaar om het te regelen. Vond het erg goed gelegen ten opzichte van de mogelijkheden om leuke uitstapjes te maken. Wij zijn hier een week geweest, en als wij hier terugkomen op Java zullen wij zeker dit Hotel weer reserveren.
title: Een hotel waar je jezelf thuisvoelt

text: Een uitstekend centraal gelegen hotel waarbij persoonlijke service hoog in het vaandel staat. Schone kamers en een uitgebreid buffet met veel variatie elke dag. Bij het zwembad staat Juba altijd voor je klaar om je te voorzien van de lekkerste fruit cocktails en crepes. Tip: probeer de crepe met banaan en hagelslag :D
title: Hotel met beste personeel ter wereld

text:
Het hotel is schoon; er is zwembad voor verkoeling en het ontbijt is lekker en voldoende keuze. De personeel is zeer vriendelijk en als gast wordt je in de watten gelegd: klant is koning! Het hotel ligt in de stad; wil je 's avonds elders eten kan je lopen naar andere restaurant. Het hotel heeft ook een eigen restaurant, hoewel de keuze wat beperkt is het eten ook goed. Wil je uitgaan met de auto heeft het hotel ook een auto te huur die redelijk in prijs is. Bij het hotel kan je tickets b.v Ramayana in Prambanan laten bestellen
Kortom een hotel om aan te bevelen mits je de omgeving van Magelang wilt bezichtigen: Borobudur, Mendut, Merbabu, Jogya, Kaliurang met Merapi museum etc
title: Hotel voor vacantie in Magelang (Java) Indonesie

text: Sfeervol familiehotel midden in Semarang. Zeer gastvrije crew met typisch Javaanse touch. Prima kamers en -wat een verademing- héél schoon. Kinderen genoten van zwembad. Ontbijtbuffet uitgebreid indonesch en europees. UItstekende uitvalbasis voor dagtrips naar Yogja, Borobudur, Prambanan, Dijeng-plateau. Prachtig indonesische moderne kunstmuseum (www.ohdmuseum.com) letterlijk om de hoek,bezoek meer dan waard! Veel winkels en eettentjes ook. Na tochtjes voelde het steeds weer als echt thuiskomen in Hotel. Hebben verblijf speciaal verlengd vanwege service en feel-home ervaring. Eigenaar en eigenaresse tonen zelf discrete betrokkenheid bij hun gasten; spreken goed engels en zelfs een beetje nederlands.Namiddag gratis snack in sfeervolle Pendopo bij pool. Wifi in alg ruimtes en pool. Massage op aanvraag beschikbaar. Aanrader voor wie naar authentieke Indonesische gastvrijheid op zoek is. Top!
title: Service with a Smile

text:
Een goede middenklasse hotel, ligt in het centrum, vriendelijk personeel, schone kamers, uitgebreidt ontbijt. Ik kan zeker dit hotel aanbevelen. Komt graag terug. Wifi in de algemene ruimte
Op loop afstand vd locale markt en het centrum. In de omgeving van het hotel veel restaurant.
Heerlijk hotel om lang te vertoeven.
title: Heel goed
